    • Controller

      public Controller​(View view)
      Constructor for the Controller, assigns value to view. Creates an instance of model. If statement used for debugging problems with code.
      Parameters:
      view - takes in the instance of View accessed in Screen

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the dynamic aspects of every screen such as remaining budget and lep count.

    • drag

      public void drag​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, javafx.scene.shape.Circle iv)
      Drag logic, gets the plant that was dragged and assigns it to n, then updates the x, y locations of the plant based on the x, y location set in model and the x, y location identified by the mouse movements. Translates the movements for the circle plant object. Sets the drag boundaries so plants can't be dragged out of the garden plot. Checks for drag collision of plants and prevents the collision.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent for dragging the plants in the garden, mouse movements by user
      iv - the circle object of the plant being dragged

    • getDragHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> getDragHandler​(javafx.scene.shape.Circle iv)
      EventHandler of MouseEvent for drag, used in ModifyPlotScreen for when the plant is dragged in the garden. Uses lambda to get mouse movements.
      Parameters:
      iv - the circle object of the plant being dragged
      Returns:
      the MouseEvent for drag, event of mouse movement

    • getOnGardenDragDetected

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> getOnGardenDragDetected​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView iv)
      EventHandler of MouseEvent for setOnDragDetected when starting the Drag and Drop Gesture on a plant ImageView. Used in ModifyPlotScreen when the plant ImageView is clicked and dragged.
      Parameters:
      iv - the ImageView of the plant being drag and dropped
      Returns:
      the EventHandler of the DRAG_DETECTED MouseEvent

    • getOnGardenDragOver

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.DragEvent> getOnGardenDragOver()
      EventHandler of DragEvent for setOnDragOver when handling a DRAG_OVER event on a target. Used in ModifyPlotScreen when the plant ImageView is dragged over a potential drop target.
      Returns:
      the EventHandler of the DRAG_OVER DragEvent

    • getOnGardenDragDropped

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.DragEvent> getOnGardenDragDropped()
      EventHandler of DragEvent for setOnDragDropped when handling a DRAG_DROPPED event on a target. Used in ModifyPlotScreen when the plant ImageView is dropped on the garden plot/AnchorPane.
      Returns:
      the EventHandler of the DRAG_DROPPED DragEvent

    • getCheckboxHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> getCheckboxHandler​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.ImageView> imageViews)
      EventHandler of setOnAction ActionEvent for CheckBox filtering of Woody and Herbaceous plant types. Used in ModifyPlotScreen when the Woody and Herbaceous CheckBoxes are clicked on.
      Parameters:
      imageViews - the HashMap of current ImageViews in the plant selection menu based on user selected conditions
      Returns:
      the EventHandler of the setOnAction ActionEvent

    • removePlant

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> removePlant​(javafx.scene.shape.Circle iv)
      EventHandler of MouseEvent for removing the plant in the garden on mouse right click. Updates the dynamic aspects of relevant screens.
      Parameters:
      iv - the circle object of the plant being removed from the garden
      Returns:
      the EventHandler of the setOnMouseClicked MouseEvent

    • getplants

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Plant> getplants()
      Getter method to get the HashMap of all plants in the application in model.
      Returns:
      the HashMap of all plants in the application from model
